p: Preliminary results (N = 7) indicated that the range of ventricular increase was between 20 % and 63% (median = 37%) for the left ventricle, and between 16% and 172% (median = 58%) for the right ventricle. None of the dog owners reported significant changes in the behavior of their dog during the given period, and despite the ventricular enlargement the dogs were able to perform the trained task fulfilling above mentioned strict criteria.
